name: Super Beat Fighter
description:
This game was made for the fire side game jam. The theme was rejuvenation. 

Big thanks to arrowthejess and kokutouchichi for their help as a team.

Support Jess by watching her steams on twitch, you can find her at https://www.twitch.tv/arrowtothejess    

Jess did the music and Kokutouchichi did the art for the game.

You can find my stuff  @ https://www.twitch.tv/epicnoob1009

and youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC88mPt3knDtrqrcO4lMB3Dw
